name: Bronze Hare Cufflinks
description:
Stand out with Great British style!

By Emily's British eccentricity shines through in these characterful rabbits with gleaming red eyes, making these bronze cufflinks an essential addition to any suit.

Each individual cufflink is handmade with exquisite attention to detail in and set with vivid red rubies- a perfect birthday or Christmas gift, presented in a By Emily black box.

Measures: 
Rabbit head measures approximately 2.5cm x 1cm

Dimensions: 
Each rabbit cufflink measures approximately 2.5x1cm

name: Dormouse Ring
description:
This adorable dormouse ring is a must have this season!

Each cheeky dormouse is made with stunning attention to detail in silver and sits with his tail twisted around a brass ring. This lovely ring was commissioned as a special Mothers Day gift, we loved it so much we added it to the Alice collection.

Available in sizes J-P. If you require another size than that that is listed, please dont hesitate to get in touch.

Packaged in a By Emily box.

name: Bronze Rabbit Necklace
description:
Featured in the December 2013 issue of Cosmopolitan!

This bronze pendant is inspired by Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and is suspended from a sparkling diamond cut silver chain.

Each rabbit is individually handcrafted with intricate attention to detail. Organic in shape and texture this beautiful bunny seems ready to leap into life.

Gift-wrapped with quintessential charm in a vintage tea cup packaged in a black By Emily box.

name: NEW! Sailing Boat Sapphire Bangle
description:
This dainty handmade sterling silver bracelet depicts a sailing boat tossed in rolling waves.

Each piece is oxidised reflecting the dramatic black and white pen and ink illustrations of the novel and offset with a stormy blue sapphire. 

Paul Gallico's novel 'The Snow Goose' is the latest poignant narrative to be portrayed in Emily Sidwell’s enchanting jewellery range. This charming tale of tragedy and heartbreak, love and loss, friendship and hope is captured in this unique By Emily collection through a series of stunning sterling silver designs.

Beautifully presented in a By Emily box.

Dimension/Size:

One size, opening with a simple clasp.

Material Used:

Sterling silver, sapphire bead

name: Alice's Teapot Necklace
description:
"Curiouser and curiouser..." Open the lid of this tarnished teapot to reveal a tiny silver mouse hiding inside! This lovely necklace is inspired by The Mad Hatters Tea party.

Each necklace is sculpted by hand from wax with stunning attention to detail and cast in bronze and silver to form this stunning piece delicately imprinted with Emily's fingerprints.

This beautiful necklace would make an ideal birthday or christmas gift and would be the perfect addition to this seasons wonderland themed wardrobe

Gift-wrapped with quentissential English charm in a vintage tea cup carefully packaged in a By Emily box.

Made from:
Bronze, sterling silver

Dimensions:
Measures approximately 2cm x 2cm and hangs from a 81cm bronze chain.
................................................

DELIVERY

Please note delivery prices:

UK

£6 by Special Delivery

INTERNATIONAL:

By Emily delivers anywhere in the world - standard international postage charge is £6 for international recorded delivery

name: NEW! Miniature Galloping Horse Necklace
description:
By Emily's British eccentricity shines through in this miniature version of the galloping horse necklace.

Stand out with great British style.

Handmade with exquisite attention to detail this dainty solid silver, 22ct gold vermeil necklace was inspired by Eadweard Muybridge's study of the galloping horse.

Wear this necklace with even the scruffiest of garments will make you feel effortlessly stylish and will garner compliments and envious glances a plenty.

Beautifully presented in a branded By Emily box.

description:

name: Robin Pin
description:
Tweet Tweet! This merry bronze robin pin with silver and red enamel detail has a lovely hand drawn quality.

We love our charming birdie pin and we are sure you will too. Just fasten to the lapel of your coat or to a cardigan to brighten up those dark winter days!

This lovely dainty brooch is individually handmade ensuring that no two birdies are exactly the same- a perfectly unique gift!

Beautifully presented in a sparkling organza bag.

name: Stalking Fox Ring
description:
Quintessentially English, this rose gold vermeil Fox Ring is inspired by countryside sports.

Watch out for the stalking fox!

Hand made with intricate attention to detail this crafty fox appears ready to leap across your fingers. Throwing this ring on with even the scruffiest of garments will make you feel effortlessly stylish and will garner compliments and envious glances a plenty.

Gift-wrapped with exquisite English charm in a vintage tea cup carefully packaged in a By Emily box.


Available in: Bronze plated 22ct rose gold or Silver plated 22ct rose gold.

Also available with glittering emerald green eyes.


Model photo by Simon Martner for www.gemalley.com
